# c3tools

Collections of simple commands.

## Install

    pip install c3tools

## Included packages

### Network Tools

- udp-test
- tcping

### System Tools
- ps2
- uname2

### Service Tools
- ipa-utils
- sftpd
- python-sendmail

### File Tools

- filesplitor
- tail
- copytruncate

### Codec Tools

- pwgen
- zencore-json2csv
- python-json2yaml
- hashtools
- qrimg
- rot-codec
- transencoding

### Office Tools

- xlsx-split
- xlsx-xargs
- pdf-tools
- makegif
- gif-frames
